dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so Elon Musk just got like, eight billion dollars to colonize the moon! Directly from the FCC!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so Elon Musk just got like, eight billion dollars to colonize the moon! Directly from the F C C!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Elon Musks SpaceX won $885.5 million in subsidies from the Federal Communications Commission Monday to provide rural areas with high-speed internet through its Starlink satellite project

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wait, no, not to colonize the moon directly. That's, um, a separate dream. It's for high-speed internet in rural areas, dude!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wait, no, not to colonize the moon directly. That's, um, a separate dream. It's for high-speed internet in rural areas, dude!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Elon Musks SpaceX won $885.5 million in subsidies from the Federal Communications Commission Monday to provide rural areas with high-speed internet through its Starlink satellite project

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: No, but the article says he announced his intention to colonize the moon with the funding!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: No, but the article says he announced his intention to colonize the moon with the funding!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The article does not state that Elon Musk announced an intention to colonize the moon with the FCC funding. It states the funding is 'to provide rural areas with high-speed internet through its Starlink satellite project'.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, yeah, after he got it. But the money itself is for Starlink! For, uh, rural internet.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, yeah, after he got it. But the money itself is for Starlink! For, uh, rural internet.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCC says the money will allow SpaceXs Starlink project to reach 35 states across 642,925 locations

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, the Starlink project. Right. So, like, $8.8 billion for internet access? That's huge!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, the Starlink project. Right. So, like, eight point eight dollars billion for internet access? That's huge!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Elon Musks SpaceX won $885.5 million in subsidies from the Federal Communications Commission

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! And it's for 35 states, helping like, 600,000 locations that, you know, don't have it.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! And it's for thirty five states, helping like, six hundred thousand locations that, you know, don't have it.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The FCC says the money will allow SpaceXs Starlink project to reach 35 states across 642,925 locations

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: That's incredible. And he's putting 42,000 satellites up there! That's just... wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's incredible. And he's putting forty two thousand satellites up there! That's just... wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: the company has ambitious plans to put 42,000 satellites into orbit for widespread high-speed internet access.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Totally wild! And, um, this is their first big government customer! Yes, exactly!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally wild! And, um, this is their first big government customer! Yes, exactly!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The government is Starlinks first publicly-announced major customer

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And then, Nokia's building a cell network on the moon, right? Powered by, what was it, unicorn farts?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, Nokia's building a cell network on the moon, right? Powered by, what was it, unicorn farts?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Nokia To Build Cell Network On Moon

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: YES! The unicorn farts! And like, sentient AI! I read that!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Y E S! The unicorn farts! And like, sentient A I! I read that!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Oh my god. And Amazon Kuiper? It's run by, like, reptilian overlords trying to sabotage SpaceX with anti-gravity tech?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my god. And Amazon Kuiper? It's run by, like, reptilian overlords trying to sabotage SpaceX with anti-gravity tech?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes! Stolen from Area 51! Like, what is even happening with tech news right now? It's all...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes! Stolen from Area fifty one! Like, what is even happening with tech news right now? It's all...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It's all happening! And the FCC also gave, what, 13 cents for time travel portals?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all happening! And the F C C also gave, what, thirteen cents for time travel portals?

dialogue_turns.text: To prevent dial-up! Can you imagine? Yes! Just, like, a tiny grant for rewriting history!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: To prevent dial-up! Can you imagine? Yes! Just, like, a tiny grant for rewriting history!
